basic.Source: Designed based on sequence alignment with scorpion linear peptides
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:S. epidermidis ATCC 12228 (MIC 7.5 uM),S. aureus (5 uM);Gram-negative bacteria:E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 50 uM), S. enterica ATCC 10708 (60 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (40uM), A. baumannii ATCC 19606 (MIC 20 uM),K. pneumoniae (60 uM).
